Text: Big Dada is a British independent record label imprint distributed by Ninja Tune.
Triplets:<Big Dada
1:
--------------------
Text: Big Dada:  It was started by reputed hip hop journalist Will Ashon in 1997.
Triplets:<Big Dada
2:
--------------------
Text: Big Dada:  It is best known for being the home of prominent British hip hop artist Roots Manuva, poet and playwright Kate Tempest, grime pioneer Wiley, rapper and designer DELS and Mercury Prize winners Speech Debelle and Young Fathers.
